update.update1: Shield bar and energy bar made into vertical bars and number handle added to both.
update.update2: button to enable/disable dragging UI added.

update.update1: UI tool tips drawn and added.
update.update2: UI buttons added to change between windows.

update.update1: Player UI changes, work on inventory UI started.
update.update2: Docking at ports added and some port UI added.

update.update1: Player Registration and Login by Username added.
update.update2: Functionality added to all main menu buttons.

update.update1: Player UI for buying shields added.
update.update2: Main menu ui for all user registration created.

update.update1: First interaction with backend performed today.
update.update2: When players click the login button they are now logged using their computers system ID.

update.update1: Fixed a bug that was loading two scenes at the same time when changing scenes.
update.update2: fixed some bugs with player tracker not properly adding players to tracking list.
Players are now tracked with a list when entering and leaving systems.
update.update3: Scene transitions now handled by index rather than title

update.update1: Solar cannon now works on planets and its' bullets collide with player.
Solar Cannon now trackers player movement and follows them.
Solar cannon added that is controlled using the arrow keys.

update.update2: Players can now land on planets
update.update3: Players can now capture planets by entering a biodome at full energy

update.update1: Energy bar now functional. When a player fires a missile or collides with something they lose energy.
Missile collision animation and sound added.
Gravity added. Players are now pulled towards the center of a system rather than straight down.
